author: Special Correspondent
text:
Poonachi launches the drive with a target to plant 2.19 lakh saplings in the district

T.P. Poonachi , Minister for Khadi and Rural Industries and R. Manoharan, Chief Whip in the State Assembly, launching a planting of saplings programme at Butterfly Park as a part of Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J. Jayalalithaa's birthday celebrations in Tiruchi on Monday.— PHOTO: M. SRINATH

Saplings were planted across the central districts as a follow-up to the drive announced by Chief Minister Jayalalithaa to plant 68 lakh saplings across the State.

Ministers, elected representatives of local bodies and officials from Forest Department, participated in the event.

In Tiruchi, T.P. Poonachi, Minister for Khadi and Rural Industries, planted the saplings at the Butterfly Park.

R. Manoharan, Chief Whip, was present.

Similar programmes were launched in Pudukottai, Perambalur and Nagapattinam districts.
title: Afforestation drive reaches the Butterfly Park
